title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
description: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies the scared patients.

title: Jaws
description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

title: Dog Day Afternoon
description: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's sex-change operation. The situation turns into a hostage crisis and a media circus.

title: Nashville
description: The lives of twenty-four characters intersect in Nashville, Tennessee, over a five-day period, culminating in a political rally.

title: Barry Lyndon
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring Original Song Score and/or Adaptation
description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
description: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

title: Shampoo
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A Beverly Hills hairdresser's life and loves are turned upside down on the eve of the 1968 presidential election.

title: The Man Who Would Be King
description: Two former British soldiers in 19th-century India decide to travel to a remote land in order to become kings.

title: Three Days of the Condor
description: A bookish CIA researcher finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

title: Picnic at Hanging Rock
description: During a rural picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence haunts the people left behind.

title: The Sunshine Boys
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A vaudeville duo agree to reunite for a TV special, but it's no easy task getting them back together, as they've hated each other for decades.

title: Hester Street
description: In 1896, a Russian-Jewish immigrant in New York City's Lower East Side struggles to assimilate into American culture.

title: The Mirror
description: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and important social events of Soviet history are reflected in his memories.

title: Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom
description: In fascist Italy, four wealthy libertines kidnap a group of young men and women and subject them to 120 days of torture, sadism, and sexual abuse.

title: The Passenger
description: A disillusioned journalist assumes the identity of a dead man and finds himself in a world of danger and intrigue.

title: Rollerball
description: In a futuristic society where corporations have replaced countries, the violent sport of Rollerball is used to control the populace.

title: Love and Death
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: A neurotic Russian is drawn into a plot to assassinate Napoleon.

title: Grey Gardens

director.name: Albert Maysles, David Maysles, Ellen Hovde, Muffie Meyer

description: A documentary about the lives of a mother and daughter, both named Edith Beale, who were relatives of Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis and lived in a decaying mansion in East Hampton, New York.

title: The Stepford Wives
description: A woman who moves to a seemingly perfect suburban town discovers that the wives are all strangely submissive.

title: French Connection II
description: Popeye Doyle travels to Marseille to track down the French drug kingpin who escaped him in New York.

title: The Wind and the Lion
description: In 1904, an American woman and her children are kidnapped by a Berber chieftain in Morocco, leading to a diplomatic crisis and a military intervention.

title: The Day of the Locust
description: A look at the dark side of Hollywood in the 1930s, as seen through the eyes of a young artist.

title: Tommy
description: A rock opera about a deaf, dumb, and blind boy who becomes a pinball wizard and a religious leader.

title: Night Moves
description: A private detective's search for a missing teenager takes him on a dark journey into the underbelly of Los Angeles.

title: Smile
description: A satirical look at a small-town beauty pageant in California.

title: The Return of the Pink Panther
description: The bumbling Inspector Clouseau is back on the case when the famous Pink Panther diamond is stolen again.

title: Funny Lady
description: The continuing story of Fanny Brice, as she rises to fame and finds a new love in the form of showman Billy Rose.

title: The Drowning Pool
description: Private eye Lew Harper is hired by a former flame to solve a blackmail case, and he finds himself in a world of corruption and murder.

title: The Eiger Sanction
description: A college professor and former assassin is blackmailed into carrying out one last hit.

title: Bite the Bullet
description: A group of contestants in a grueling 700-mile horse race in the Old West must contend with the elements, each other, and their own personal demons.

title: Hard Times
description: During the Great Depression, a street fighter and a fast-talking promoter team up to make some money.

title: The Killer Elite
description: A government agent is betrayed by his partner and left for dead, but he returns to seek revenge.

title: The Hindenburg
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Sound Effects
Special Achievement Award for Visual Effects
description: A dramatization of the 1937 Hindenburg disaster, in which a German airship caught fire and was destroyed.

title: The Story of Adèle H.
description: The story of Victor Hugo's daughter, Adèle, and her obsessive, unrequited love for a British military officer.

title: Lisztomania
description: A surreal and phantasmagorical look at the life of 19th-century composer Franz Liszt.

title: Mahogany
description: A poor young woman from the Chicago slums becomes a successful fashion designer in Rome, but her ambition and her love for a charismatic activist threaten to tear her apart.

title: Mandingo
description: A controversial and graphic depiction of slavery in the antebellum South.

title: One of Our Dinosaurs Is Missing
description: A group of nannies in 1920s London must find a missing dinosaur skeleton that contains a secret formula.

title: Race with the Devil
description: Two couples on a road trip are pursued by a satanic cult after they witness a human sacrifice.

title: The Apple Dumpling Gang
description: A gambler in the Old West finds himself saddled with three orphans and a bumbling pair of outlaws.

title: The Great Waldo Pepper
description: A barnstorming pilot in the 1920s dreams of becoming a famous aviator.

title: Brannigan
description: A Chicago cop is sent to London to extradite a gangster, but he finds himself in the middle of a war between two rival gangs.
